segments.text: Tired and stressed . This wedding is giving me a headache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just relax . With me as your maid of honor , everything will be fine !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm worried that everything will be chaotic !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! I'm the tour guide . I'll take care of the Taiwanese guests .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're going to have to tell them what to do in church , what everything means ...
segments.speaker: S2
